EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / Chuck Knutson (1343053005.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Chuck, Understood thanks for the update. Let me know if you ever need anything from my end. Take care,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: knupal@aol.com [mailto:knupal@aol.com] Sent: Saturday, July 21, 2012 9:10 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / Chuck Knutson Sara - Never happened. In holding pattern at this time.
Will be in touch if something does materialize.
Regards, Chuck Knutson -----Original Message----- From: Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> To: knupal <knupal@aol.com <mailto:knupal@aol.com>> Sent: Sat, Jul 21, 2012 12:35 pm Subject: MBO Partners / Chuck KnutsonHello Chuck,I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding the services provided by MBO Partners. You mentioned you may be starting a new consulting contract. How is that going?Here are a few tools that summarize our conversation from before: - There are some webinars and videos we have created that might assist you in finding your next contract if you have not already found one: http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index <http://www.mbopartners.com/mbo-partners-webcast-index> - MBO Partners continues to invest in being a leader for independent consultants across the country. I also wanted to share the news that we released a study you may be interested in. For the first time, theres real hard facts about The State of Independence in America that will reveal not just how many millions of independent professionals there are in the country, but also the unique things that motivate them and help them stay happily independent. Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you.Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com></htm
